definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The manager's suggestion to freeze salary raises catcalls among the staff.
sentences.chinese: 经理冻结薪金的建议引起职员的反对声音。

sentences.english: The boss demanded a kickback on her wages.
sentences.chinese: 老板要从她的薪金中拿走回扣。

sentences.english: Charley spoke to the manager about John's salary .
sentences.chinese: 查利为约翰的薪金问题和经理谈过。

sentences.english: A roofer's compensation premium is greater than his gross salary.
sentences.chinese: 阿屋顶的补偿溢价大于他的薪金毛额。

sentences.english: They were dissatisfied at not getting a better salary.
sentences.chinese: 他们对不能得到较高薪金而感到不满足。

sentences.english: Salaries were disbursed by the paymaster's office.
sentences.chinese: 薪金已由工薪出纳员办公室发放。

sentences.english: Her skills were in such demand that she could dictate her own salary.
sentences.chinese: 她因其技术奇货可居，故可以主宰自己的薪金待遇。

sentences.english: Aquilani would also reduce his wages, as he would earn €2.5 million.
sentences.chinese: 阿奎拉齐可能也会将他的薪金降至250万欧元。

sentences.english: His yearly salary reachs five-digit number.
sentences.chinese: 他一年的薪金达到五位数。

sentences.english: It allowed him to serve as president without pocketing a salary.
sentences.chinese: 这让他担任总统期间无须花费自己的薪金。

sentences.english: Trace Foundation offers an excellent salary and benefit package.
sentences.chinese: 利众基金会提供优厚的薪金待遇和全套福利。

sentences.english: Only full-time graduate are eligible for interships.
sentences.chinese: 只有全日制研究生才有资格获得助教薪金。

sentences.english: They are not only all young and good, but also underpaid.
sentences.chinese: 他们不仅年轻优秀，而且在合同初期，薪金还很低。

sentences.english: He didn't quit though his salary was a little lower than that of others.
sentences.chinese: 虽然他的薪金比别人稍低，他也不辞职。

sentences.english: He is going to quit his job next month because his salary is too low.
sentences.chinese: 他由于薪金太低拟于下月辞职。

sentences.english: The perquisites attached to this job make it even more attractive than the salary indicates.
sentences.chinese: 该特权重视这项工作使其更加有吸引力的薪金比表示。

definition: to receive a raise in salary
